Object.Name: Robot Control
Object.Description1: This LWM2M Object includes all operations on robots.

Item.Name: Collision Detection
Item.Description: If Collision Detection is enabled or not, the setting of which is a Boolean value (1,0) where 1 is Enabled and 0 is Disabled.

Item.Name: Drop Detection
Item.Description: If Drop Detection is enabled or not, the setting of which is a Boolean value (1,0) where 1 is Enabled and 0 is Disabled.

Item.Name: Automatic Navigation
Item.Description: If Automatic Navigation is enabled or not, the setting of which is a Boolean value (1,0) where 1 is Enabled and 0 is Disabled.

Item.Name: Robot Shutdown
Item.Description: Shut down the robot.

Item.Name: Robot Reboot
Item.Description: Reboot the robot.

Item.Name: Robot Reset
Item.Description: Reset the robot to factory settings.

Item.Name: Robot Wakeup
Item.Description: Let the robot to wake up.

Item.Name: Robot Sleep
Item.Description: Let the robot to sleep.

Item.Name: Robot Self-checking
Item.Description: Let the robot to do self-checking.

Item.Name: Emergency Braking
Item.Description: Bark the robot emergently.

Item.Name: Emergency Braking Release
Item.Description: Release Emergency Braking for the robot.

Item.Name: Action Execution
Item.Description: Let the robot to execute a task, parameter: Action name|possible parameters if any.

Item.Name: Action List Upload
Item.Description: Upload action list, parameter:select action list to be uploaed.

Item.Name: Action List Download
Item.Description: Download action list, parameter: download path if present, else store in default directory with default name.

Item.Name: Group Dancing Program Control
Item.Description: Change playbill for group dancing, parameter:playbill.

Item.Name: Navigation Map Upload
Item.Description: Upload navigation map, parameter:select navigation map to be uploaded.

Item.Name: Group Dancing Program Control
Item.Description: Change playbill for group dancing, parameter:playbill.

Item.Name: Navigation Map Download
Item.Description: Download navigation map, parameter: download path if present, else store in default directory with default name.

Item.Name: Route list Execution
Item.Description: Execute route list , parameter:if any.

Item.Name: Route list Upload
Item.Description: Upload route list, parameter:select route list to be uploaded.

Item.Name: Route list Download
Item.Description: Download route list, parameter: download path if present, else store in default directory with default name.

Item.Name: Automatic Navigation Control
Item.Description: Enable/Disable Automatic Navigation: Parameter: 1:Enable, 0:Disable

Item.Name: Manual Navigation
Item.Description: Manual Navigation: Parameter: route info.

Item.Name: Moving to Charging Station
Item.Description: Moving to Charging Station.

Item.Name: Moving to Specified location
Item.Description: Manual Navigation: Parameter: route info.

Item.Name: Low Frequency Patrol Broadcasting
Item.Description: Patrol broadcast in low frequency.

Item.Name: Task Start
Item.Description: Start a task, parameter:task name.

Item.Name: Task Stop
Item.Description: Stop a task, parameter:task name.

Item.Name: Task Suspend
Item.Description: Suspend a task, parameter:task name.

Item.Name: Task Resume
Item.Description: Resume a task, parameter:task name.

Item.Name: Video Upload
Item.Description: Upload a video, parameter:select video to be uploaded.

Item.Name: Picture Upload
Item.Description: Upload picture, parameter:select picture to be uploaded.

Item.Name: Default Language Switching
Item.Description: Upload picture, parameter:Language name.

Item.Name: Intonation Change
Item.Description: Change intonation of the robot, parameter:Intonation name.

Item.Name: Intonation Change
Item.Description: Change intonation of the robot, parameter:Intonation name.

Item.Name: Speaking with Action
Item.Description: Robot speaks with specific action, parameter:key words|action name.

Item.Name: Collision Detection Control
Item.Description: Enable/Disable Collision Detection: Parameter: 1:Enable, 0:Disable

Item.Name: Drop Detection Control
Item.Description: Enable/Disable Drop Detection: Parameter: 1:Enable, 0:Disable
